topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b3191463687271a5000742#post_55b3191463687271a5000742
[bq="gasmaskangel"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b318c96368725b4d0002e8#post_55b318c96368725b4d0002e8
What I'm really looking forward to is there reclamation. That shit is gonna be hilarious.[/bq]
I can actually see that happening sooner rather than later all it would take is for people to start joking that supporting equal rights makes people sexist as a jab at the political correct crowd and it's game over for the people using it as a insult.

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b3191563687271a5000743#post_55b3191563687271a5000743
[bq="mariomarc"]My fav tumblr post about this is simply "Since no one is offended by motherfucker anymore, I suggest we change the term to minionfucker"
[/bq]
Normally I don't get offended by anything, but that would offend me.
